txt.en: Instance: The Perilous Pact
'Greetings, friend. I mean you no harm, and hope I did not startle you.'
'My name is Karazgar. I am but a traveller from the east. You, my friend, look a skilled warrior.'
'Yes, Scatha! Luck would have it, I also search of the beast.'
'It stole from me an heirloom from my family. I alone vowed to reclaim what my family lost.'
'That is very kind of you, Fram. I would be honoured to fight along your side!'
'Who are you? Speak your name, stranger.'
'Thank you.'
'I have not seen nor heard of you before, Karazgar. These mountains are dangerous.'
'I am Fram, and I am on a mission of revenge. I seek to slay the dreaded long-worm, Scatha.'
'That is a noble cause, Karazgar. I am close to finding the beast.'
'Perhaps we could work together?'
'You are quite skilled in combat yourself!'
'The self-exiled Man draws near.'
'He seeks Scatha, the Worm.'
'I also search for Scatha as the worm could not be tamed.'
'I could not tame Scatha, my only option was to kill the long-worm.'
'Is that Wrothbl√°da?'
'I could kill him here, take the sword and use it against Scatha.'
'However, Fram is more skilled with this particular blade than I.'
'Together we searched for the Worm.'
'That was when I learned that Fram was the son of Frumgar.'
'I then formed a plan to use Fram as a pawn.'
'I shall sow discord in the North, and kill Scatha at the same time.'
